评论详情: It was just a bit small for my needs, but the leather is beautiful and sturdy. Very nice product!
Great look for a low price and it fits in my back pocket. Love it.

This card holder is a perfect size. I have been using various leather holders like this for the last 15 years or so. This one is the best of all. The leather isn’t too thick or thin and is very soft with a nice nubuck type high quality finish. Holds 6 to 10 cards with ease. I’ve used it for a week now with 6 inside with paper separators too and 2 outside. It sits flat and is not over full and doesn’t distort the cards like some multi pocket versions do. This one is a winner!! I’ll be ordering again for sure.

Took a chance on this one and I’m pleased so far. The real leather is a little stiff like a new base ball glove but hopefully will likewise soften snd give a little with use. Stitching seems fine. The closed card storage? on either side is quite tight size wise for credit cards but I like that. I have purchased a few real leather goods made in Europe and Middle East and they hold up well and have the good feel.
